statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT id, message, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, message FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT sentiment_category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sentiment_data GROUP BY sentiment_category ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE message LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive'
SELECT id, message, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_category = 'neutral' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT sentiment_category, COUNT(*) FROM sentiment_data GROUP BY sentiment_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score), MAX(sentiment_score), MIN(sentiment_score) FROM sentiment_data
SELECT * FROM SentimentData;
SELECT id, message FROM SentimentData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, message, sentiment_score FROM SentimentData ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT response_text, emotion_category FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE emotion_category = 'happy';
SELECT id, response_text FROM ChatbotResponses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, message, sentiment_score FROM SentimentData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, message FROM SentimentData WHERE message LIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE emotion_category = 'joy' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, response_text, emotion_category FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE LENGTH(response_text) > 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, message, sentiment_score FROM SentimentData WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id='87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM sentiments WHERE user_id='abcdefgh-abcd-abcd-abcd-abcdefghijkl';
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiments WHERE user_id = '12345' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(message_id) > 5;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment FROM messages;
SELECT * FROM sentiments;
SELECT sentiment_id, message FROM sentiments ORDER BY message DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM chatbot_responses WHERE response_sentiment > 0.5;
SELECT u.username, s.message, us.user_id FROM users u JOIN user_sentiments us ON u.user_id = us.user_id JOIN sentiments s ON s.sentiment_id = us.sentiment_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT sentiment_id, message FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT users.username, sentiments.message FROM users JOIN user_sentiments ON users.user_id = user_sentiments.user_id JOIN sentiments ON user_sentiments.sentiment_id = sentiments.sentiment_id;
SELECT response_text AS response, response_sentiment AS sentiment FROM chatbot_responses WHERE response_sentiment < 0.0;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data;
SELECT id, text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT chat_text, chat_timestamp FROM chat_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY chat_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE text LIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE username = 'alice'
SELECT * FROM chat_history WHERE chat_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY chat_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT emotion_name, emotion_description FROM emotion_categories
